B

basis - package basis
 
bonus - Variable in class ants.AntGameReplayData
The ending bonus points for each bot.
bot - Variable in class ants.Ant
The bot that owns the ant.
bot - Variable in class ants.AntHill
The bot that owns the ant hill.
Bot - Class in basis
Represents a bot in the game server.
Bot(TCPClientCommunicator, String, BotMode, double, BotDBCallback) - Constructor for class basis.Bot
Creates a new bot.
bot - Variable in class basis.TCPClientCommunicator
The bot the client is logged in as.
botCount - Variable in class ants.AntMapTemplate
The number of bots the map is designed for.
BotDBCallback - Interface in basis
This interface is used by the Bot class to call back the database for certain operations on its data.
BotGameInfo - Class in basis
This class holds informations about the game a bot is currently playing.
BotGameInfo(int) - Constructor for class basis.BotGameInfo
Creates a new bot game info structure.
botId - Variable in class basis.BotGameInfo
The identifier specific to the bot for this game.
botInfos - Variable in class basis.Game
The informations relative to bots required for the game.
BotLoginException - Exception in basis
Represents an error that occurred during the login of a bot on the database side.
BotLoginException(int) - Constructor for exception basis.BotLoginException
Creates a new bot login exception.
botMap - Variable in class basis.GameManager
 
BotMode - Enum in basis
The gaming mode of a bot.
BotMode() - Constructor for enum basis.BotMode
 
bots - Variable in class basis.Game
The list of bots in the game.
